original: @194a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @194a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bha ga w'an sh'akya mu ni sto tra /
analyzed: bha ga w'an sh'akya mu ni sto tra /
translated: Bhagavan Shakyamuni Stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstod pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Blessed Shakyamuni

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: 'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron me mdzad //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron me mdzad //
translated: You who transcend the world, yet illuminate it,

original: khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros bzang //
analyzed: khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros bzang //
translated: You who accomplish the world's benefit with excellent wisdom,

original: snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba //
analyzed: snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba //
translated: Having attained illumination, dispelling the stains of afflictions,

original: 'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, the illuminator of the world.

original: sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu'i mchog mnga' ba //
analyzed: sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu'i mchog mnga' ba //
translated: Delighting in generosity, possessing the supreme ten powers,

original: gdul bya 'dul bzhin gdul bya'i pha rol byon //
analyzed: gdul bya 'dul bzhin gdul bya'i pha rol byon //
translated: You tame disciples according to their level of discipline,

original: bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa //
translated: Blessed One, worshipped by gods, humans, and nagas,

original: gdul bya'i mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gdul bya'i mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, who have perfected taming disciples.

original: mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad cing //
analyzed: mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad cing //
translated: Possessing supreme marks, you benefit many beings,

original: 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra //
analyzed: 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra //
translated: Your light extending an arm's length, like the color of gold,

original: dge ba mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba //
analyzed: dge ba mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba //
translated: Endowed with the form of the sublime marks of virtue,

original: srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: You are unrivaled in the three worlds. I pay homage to you!

original: pha rol gshegs @194b pas gzhan gyi tshogs rdzogs shing //
analyzed: pha rol gshegs @194b pas gzhan gyi tshogs rdzogs shing //
translated: You have reached the other shore, and you perfect the accumulations of others.

original: pha rol phas rgol tshogs 'joms mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: pha rol phas rgol tshogs 'joms mi g-yo ba //
translated: You conquer the armies of opponents on the other shore, and you are unwavering.

original: sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas //
translated: You are skilled in the minds and conduct of other sentient beings.

original: pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: You conquer the armies of others. I pay homage to you!

original: dgra bcom rgyal po nyon bcil dri bsal ba //
analyzed: dgra bcom rgyal po nyon bcil dri bsal ba //
translated: You are the king of arhats, who has quelled the afflictions and removed stains.

original: 'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas //
analyzed: 'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas //
translated: Your livelihood is pure, and you abide in the discipline of pure conduct.

original: lha yi lha mchog dri med dri bral ba //
analyzed: lha yi lha mchog dri med dri bral ba //
translated: You are the supreme god among gods, stainless and free from stains.

original: thugs rje mchog ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thugs rje mchog ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: You possess supreme compassion. I pay homage to you!

original: chu bo bzhi brgal bden bzhi'i bka' mchid gsung //
analyzed: chu bo bzhi brgal bden bzhi'i bka' mchid gsung //
translated: You have crossed the four rivers, and you speak the words of the four truths.

original: mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchid can //
analyzed: mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchid can //
translated: You bestow the gift of eyes, and you speak the words of the nectar of Dharma.

original: mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs //
analyzed: mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs //
translated: Your mind is impartial, and your mind has love for all beings.

original: chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur //
analyzed: chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur //
translated: You abide equally in the Dharma, and you guide human beings.

original: yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: You have perfected good qualities. I pay homage to you!

original: snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan //
analyzed: snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan //
translated: And endowed with pure, melodious speech.

original: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur snyan pa'i gsung //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur snyan pa'i gsung //
translated: Your voice is as melodious as BrahmƒÅ‚Äôs,

original: thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag gsung tshul rdzogs //
analyzed: thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag gsung tshul rdzogs //
translated: And you speak with all the melodious aspects complete.

original: bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you who speak the truth and what is pleasant!

original: stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral //
analyzed: stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral //
translated: Empty, without attributes, and free of wishes,

original: zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka' //
analyzed: zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka' //
translated: Profound, difficult to see, and difficult to realize,

original: thar la 'jug par mkhas pa'i blo gros can //
analyzed: thar la 'jug par mkhas pa'i blo gros can //
translated: You have the intelligence that engages with liberation.

original: thar pa'i lam dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thar pa'i lam dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you who delight in the path of liberation!

original: rgyu la brten pa'i mkhas pa blo gros can //
analyzed: rgyu la brten pa'i mkhas pa blo gros can //
translated: You are intelligent, relying on the cause,

original: mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mkhas pa //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mkhas pa //
translated: And you are always skilled in avoiding the two extremes.

original: las kyi 'bras bu rnam smin kho nar gsung //
analyzed: las kyi 'bras bu rnam smin kho nar gsung //
translated: You teach that actions ripen as results.

original: lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you who are free from the darkness of views!

original: gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags //
analyzed: gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags //
translated: You do not come from anywhere, nor do you go anywhere.

original: rtag tu dben pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba //
analyzed: rtag tu dben pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba //
translated: You always teach the Dharma of solitude.

original: smig rgyu sgyu bzhin nga yir mi mnga' ba //
analyzed: smig rgyu sgyu bzhin nga yir mi mnga' ba //
translated: Like a mirage or an illusion, you have no ‚Äúmine.‚Äù

original: dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩskye dang mi skye gang du skyes ma lags //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // skye dang mi skye gang du skyes ma lags //
translated: I pay homage to you, the one who has the way of virtue.üîΩWhere is there birth or non-birth?

original: skye dang 'jig dang gang du mi gsal ba //
analyzed: skye dang 'jig dang gang du mi gsal ba //
translated: Where is there birth and destruction, or non-manifestation?

original: chos kyi gnas nyid ji ltar gnas la gnas //
analyzed: chos kyi gnas nyid ji ltar gnas la gnas //
translated: How does one abide in the abiding of dharmas?

original: gnas dang mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gnas dang mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Victorious One, who is beyond abiding and non-abiding.

original: de bzhin kho na ba bzhin yang dag gsung //
analyzed: de bzhin kho na ba bzhin yang dag gsung //
translated: You speak the truth just as it is.

original: rtag tu mi g-yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs //
analyzed: rtag tu mi g-yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs //
translated: You always remain unmoving in suchness.

original: ri rab rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dra ba'i sku //
analyzed: ri rab rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dra ba'i sku //
translated: Your body is like Mount Meru, a vajra victory banner.

original: mi g-yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mi g-yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, who are immovable like Mount Meru.

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise of the Blessed One Shakyamuni, composed by the master Ratnashri, is completed.
